title: HoopDirt.com honors Rocky Mountain Coach Bill Dreikosen
title_page: HoopDirt.com honors Rocky Mountain Coach Bill Dreikosen
maintext:
The website HoopDirt.com has selected Bill Dreikosen of Rocky Mountain College the NAIA Coach of the Week.
Last week, Dreikosen guided the Battlinâ€™ Bears to wins over No. 8 Carroll College and No. 13 Montana Western.
Dreikosen is now eligible to receive the HoopDirt.com National Coach of the Year award.
Rocky, which has won three straight, continues its Frontier Conference home stand with games against Montana Tech on Thursday and Lewis-Clark State on Saturday.
